title: Finding God in Culture
description:
For a deeper dive into cultural theology, check out the "Christ and Culture" series on the Deep Talks podcast:
Part 1:
https://www.podbean.com/eu/pb-q4dqt-b5cff7

Part 2:
https://www.podbean.com/eu/pb-gwg8n-b6b2ee

Part 3:
https://www.podbean.com/eu/pb-5s4bk-b83055


To support on Patreon go to:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast
